Uses of Package
org.helianto.core.dao

Packages that use org.helianto.core.dao
org.helianto.core.dao Provides the base of a data access object (DAO) persistence layer. 
org.helianto.core.hibernate Hibernate-specific implementations of the domain model interface. 
org.helianto.core.service Generic services support classes. 
 

Classes in org.helianto.core.dao used by org.helianto.core.dao

          A lightweight dao interface.

          Extends the LightWeightDao to provide additional methods to access code.
